name: Welfare safety net program; department of human services
text: [§346-69]  Welfare safety net program; department of human services.  The department of human services may create a welfare safety net program entitled "Keeping Hope Alive" to assist working families that will be disqualified from receiving further public assistance as a consequence of reaching the five-year time limit set by the federal Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity [Reconciliation] Act of 1996. [L 2001, c 150, §4]
